H0.text: Which group released an album in 1986 entitled ‘The Queen is Dead’. The Cure

H3.text: Which group released an album in 1986 entitled ‘The Queen is Dead’. The smith

A4.text: The Smiths' third studio album, The Queen Is Dead, was released in June 1986
